summary.research_focus: Collaborative Software Systems, AI, Data Science, Cyber-physical Technologies

submission_info.submission_guidelines: Papers must be original content not published or submitted for publication elsewhere. Papers must be written in English and formatted according to specific guidelines.

summary.event: 33rd IEEE International Conference on Enabling Technologies (WETICE 2025)
summary.registration: All registration info is available at the conference website
summary.description: WETICE 2025 is a leading international forum dedicated to advancing research, fostering collaboration, and sharing innovations in the landscape of collaborative intelligence and decentralized software systems.
summary.publication_details: Proceedings will be submitted for inclusion in IEEE Xplore, Scopus, DBLP, and Google Scholar.
program_highlights: Paper sessions covering hot topics in various areas of computer science and software technologies
Social activities and an excursion on the last day
summary.community_invitation: We’d love to see you there.
summary.academic_reputation: Technically sponsored by IEEE.org, IEEE Computer Society Italy Chapter and IEEE Systems, Man and Cybernetics Society Italy Chapter
